column4: real quick question, i have a friend who needs some help with her computer, might install ubuntu, it is an older xp computer with only 512mb of ram, im not for sure the other specs, but i was wondering what a good version of ubuntu for it would be, can it handle lucid?
cool, so ill check out xubuntu and lubuntu
k, i will have to check out lubuntu, i have heard of xubuntu but not familiar with lubuntu at al
one is using qt, the other is using gtk
